title: WP_REST_API_Comment
description: A comment object in a REST API context.

author.description: The ID of the user object, if author was a user.

author_email.description: Email address for the object author. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

author_ip.description: IP address for the object author. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

author_name.description: Display name for the object author.

author_user_agent.description: User agent for the object author. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

raw.description: Content for the object, as it exists in the database. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

rendered.description: HTML content for the object, transformed for display.

date.description: The date the object was published, in the site's timezone.

date_gmt.description: The date the object was published, as GMT.

parent.description: The ID for the parent of the object.

post.description: The ID of the associated post object.

type.description: Type of Comment for the object.

author_avatar_urls.description: Avatar URLs for the object author.

24.description: Avatar URL with image size of 24 pixels.

48.description: Avatar URL with image size of 48 pixels.

96.description: Avatar URL with image size of 96 pixels.

additionalProperties.description: Avatar URL with image of another size.
